events.name: Windows Phone 8 Hackathon!
events.about:
About

Hacker Academy is proud to present our Windows Phone 8 hackathon. This hackathon is designed for students from any school, in any year, with any level of experience.

Were looking to provide a great experience for all levels of developers, if youre experienced youll be able to compete for some of our fantastic prizes, and if youre a beginner this is a great opportunity to come out and learn!

Read more about the event at www.hackeracademy.org/hackathon
